cosmo = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.27, Omega_b=0.045, h=0.67, sigma8=0.8, n_s=
    0.96, transfer_function=tf, matter_power_spectrum=pk, m_nu=m_nu)
if tf is not None:
    with pytest.warns(CCLWarning):
        ccl.linear_matter_power(cosmo, 1, 1)
with pytest.raises(CCLError):
    ccl.nonlin_matter_power(cosmo, 1, 1)
pytest.mark.parametrize('tf,pk,m_nu', [(None, 'emu', 0.06), ('bbks', 'emu',
    0.06), ('eisenstein_hu', 'emu', 0.06)])
